item.title: Broadband Access Wireless Internet Providers
item.description:
Wireless internet isn’t just for mobile devices. Businesses can also benefit from fixed wireless services. One affordable option utilizes existing cell towers to provide broadband similar to a T1 line at nearly half the cost. Accel Networks, for instance, partners with major carriers to leverage their bandwidth, achieving 99.9% reliability and quick installation times. This solution is ideal for businesses requiring PCI-compliant connections, like convenience stores or gas stations, especially those in areas with limited wired options...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/broadband-access-wireless-internet-providers/
